PERSONAL STATEMENT

Surgeons looking to pursue a future in Trauma, Arthroscopy and Arthroplasty.

A trusted, patient foc used doctor serving patients by successfully diagnosing, treating and 
also managing their  illnesses and degenerative diseases.  
 
Able to exhibit the knowledge, skills and attitudes relating to gender, culture and ethnicity 
pertinent to orthopaedics and inc orporate these in research activities.
